alert.note: Alert for Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 10 at 4:03AM EST until December 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Aroostook County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 1 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and isolated power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility this morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
